data.actual_result: Notifications item is missing on the action sheet, meaning that you can't configure notification frequency preferences for the category if you can't manage channels
data.expected_result: There should be a "Notifications" item on the action sheet, because if you have Manage Channels in this server and enter category settings, you can see that notification frequency preferences are configurable for categories
data.short_description: On categories, you can't edit notification frequency preferences (All messages, mentions only, etc), unless you have manage channels permission, because "Notifications" item is missing on the category long-press sheet
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server with a category - Long press on a category in channel drawer
